Judul: CREDIT SCORING ANALYSIS ON BUSINESS CREDIT ON BANK ABC
Abstrak: This final project is built to make model which can improve the bank performance in business credit. The analysis is using linear regression of each variable with the dependent variable is collectability of each customer. The data of customer is taking from the bank branch in Sumedang City which gathered in three months. The customer data include the sixteen variable; age, gender, maximum credit, interest, time limit, loan control, sector, loyality, legality, NPWP, guarantee, background, CR, education, company form, and bank product.The final project is done by finding the significant variable. The significant variable in this model is six variables. The propose model also has not good enough R square. The result of this report is the equation which can use to find customer collectability.
Kata Kunci: Business credit, consumer credit, regression linear, default customer, collectability, age, gender, maximum credit, interest, time limit, loan control, sector, loyality, legality, NPWP, guarantee, background, CR, education, company form, and bank product
